channel.title: Thomas Davis – Writing & Technical Notes
channel.description: Essays and technical writing on software architecture, UI systems, leadership, and modern professional life.

item.title: Active Duty Army in 2025: The Reality Behind the Uniform
item.description: An honest look at what Active Duty Army life feels like in 2025 — the pace, the pressure, the administrative load, and the growing gap between effort and purpose.

item.title: Leadership vs Management: Why the Difference Matters More Than Ever
item.description: A clear distinction between leadership and management, why confusing the two damages teams, and how strong leaders balance structure with trust.

item.title: Burnout vs Discipline: Why Consistency Beats Intensity
item.description: Why sustainable discipline outperforms short bursts of motivation, and how professionals quietly burn out when consistency is replaced by intensity.

item.title: Building Clean UI Systems Without Frameworks
item.description: Lessons learned from building system-style UIs using native web technologies, focusing on predictability, state management, and long-term maintainability.

item.title: Building a Programming Language in JavaScript: Genesis Script v2
item.description: A deep dive into designing and implementing a beginner-friendly programming language with a tokenizer, parser, interpreter, transpiler, and CLI tooling.
